title: Advanced Manufacturing Engineer - iPad

description:
Responsible for designing precision assembly and measurement processes for Apple products. Perform the research and development on new technologies vital to tackle complex assembly and automation problems that have direct impact to the quality and delivery of Apple products. Design, implement and successfully scale automated and semi- automated solutions based upon sound engineering principles and the technologies developed for a specific application. ...
{Detailed Description Continued}
key_qualifications:
Strong work experience in precision assembly, inspection and automation equipment
Required to understand and build tolerance analysis for parts and assemblies....
education_experience: SME or equivalent. 3 plus years in an engineering role with experience in automation equipment used for alignment, assembly and/or measurement of components.
additional_requirements:
-  New product introduction and Manufacturing Operations experience desired
-  Proven track record of cost reduction, project management and engineering design required
- Strong understanding of GD&T principles favorable. NX, SolidWorks CAD or ProE experiences a plus. JMP, Minitab & Six Sigma experience preferred
-  Knowledge of optics principles as they relate to CCD cameras, 2D and 1D lasers, and their use for positioning and critical alignment machines
